createTable.remarks: Holds identification information for a specific data-set managed by a business application and to which access must be controlled.

column.name: name
column.remarks: The (application unique) name of the data-set

column.name: description
column.remarks: A free-text description of the data-set

column.name: category
column.remarks: The category (or type) of data items included in the data-set

column.name: discriminator
column.remarks: A discriminator value that identifies the specific data items included in the data-set

column.name: application_id
column.remarks: The identifier of the application defining the data-set

column.name: created_by
column.remarks: The name of the user who created the entry

column.name: created_on
column.remarks: The date and time the entry was created

column.name: modified_by
column.remarks: The name of the user who performed the last update on the entry

column.name: modified_on
column.remarks: The date and time the entry was last updated
